OOC( OK, I thought since HotRod had been on the Cybertron fire for as 
long as he had been, he would have learned something)


::Spears::
She stood there with Prebon holding her arm with the gun to her 
head.  She cried and looked out into the field. She spoke up just 
enough for the others to hear,"Please....please." she cried while 
talking,"Please let us go." She cried and let the tears roll down her 
face.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> How in the pit would Hot Rod have ANY codes whatsoever from the 
Cybertronian 
> Fire. He wasn't any high official, he didn't even spend that much 
time in the 
> bridge. And I don't remember Kluster, Firearm, Proto, Rex, 
Grimmler, or 
> Chordate telling him any of the codes.
> 
> ::Ramulus/Firearm/Proto/Smokescreen/Slayer::
> 
> Ramulus continues walking, thinking over Koj's suggestion. "No," he 
replies 
> to the cloaked bot, "We have a few air troops as it is, but we need 
the 
> ground troops."
> 
> He looks up as Prebon and Spears come into view, shouts from Spears 
floating 
> back to him. That didn't sound like Spears at all, not the Spears 
that yelled 
> at Unitron back when the Newcomers attacked the Ark... But where 
was Striker?
> 
> He frowns, slowly aproaching.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Firearm and Proto were flying high above Prebon and Spears, looking 
down at 
> them, their jetpacks not making a sound. Both of them could feel a 
battle 
> coming, they've had enough military experience to know that they 
wern't 
> getting Spears back so easilly.. But they couldn't see Striker 
anywhere.
> 
> THe two bots frown, weapons ready.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Smokescreen stops, Prebon in clear view. He had his gun out, 
waiting for 
> something to happen.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Slayer's eyes narrow as he watches Ramulus get closer and closer, 
his weapons 
> tracking the Maximal. Soon, Ramulus would be in firing range...
> 
> His eyes narrow as he sees Lunarpine next to Ramulus. What was that 
bot doing 
> here? He glances at Prebon, wondering if his master had noticed.
